job1.title: Senior Full-Stack Software Engineer
job1.description:
We are looking for a Senior Full-Stack Software Engineer to join our growing team. You will be responsible for building scalable web applications using modern technologies.

**Requirements:**
- 5+ years of experience in software development
- Strong proficiency in JavaScript, TypeScript, React, and Node.js
- Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or GCP)
- Knowledge of database design and optimization (PostgreSQL, MongoDB)
- Experience with microservices architecture
- Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail

**Nice to have:**
- Experience with Docker and Kubernetes
- Knowledge of CI/CD pipelines
- Previous startup experience
- Contributions to open-source projects

job2.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job2.description:
Join our AI team to build cutting-edge machine learning models and deploy them to production. You'll work on exciting projects involving NLP, computer vision, and recommendation systems.

**Requirements:**
- Master's degree in Computer Science, Statistics, or related field
- 3+ years of experience in ML engineering
- Proficiency in Python, TensorFlow, and PyTorch
- Experience with MLOps and model deployment
- Strong understanding of deep learning architectures

**Nice to have:**
- Published research papers
- Experience with distributed training
- Knowledge of AWS SageMaker or Google Cloud ML

job3.title: Frontend Developer (React)
job3.description:
We're seeking a talented Frontend Developer to create beautiful, responsive web experiences. You'll work closely with designers and backend engineers to bring designs to life.

**Requirements:**
- 3+ years of React development experience
- Strong CSS and design skills
- Experience with modern frontend tooling (Webpack, Vite)
- Knowledge of responsive design principles
- Portfolio demonstrating clean, efficient code

**Nice to have:**
- Experience with Next.js or Remix
- Animation skills (Framer Motion, GSAP)
- Design background
